subject: Sex Crimes
Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The four-year cycle of a World Cup is almost run. Italy and France, which contested a final in Berlin in 2006, appear to be girding some of the same old cast, with more bad odor along the way.
snippet: The four-year cycle of a World Cup is almost run. Italy and France, which contested a final in Berlin in 2006, appear to be girding some of the same old cast, with more bad odor along the way.
